{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03259v1", "title": "HKKN-stratifications in a non-compact framework", "summary": "The aim of this paper is twofold. First, we study HKKN stratifications, both
algebraically and analytically, for a Cartesian product between a vector space
and a compact K{\"a}hler manifold. We then use these stratifications to prove
convexity properties of the moment map for non-compact analytic subsets
invariant under a Borel subgroup.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG,math.DG,math.SG", "published": "2025-05-06T07:40:53Z"}
